column5: Very Very funny standup comedian John Pinette passed away on Saturday in his motel room from natural causes,
Very sorry to hear this! He was a very funny dude... "Salad is not food, it is a promisary note of real food to come" Have always loved that line! RIP HH
Nay, NAY!  RIP John. No more camping trips, no more buffet line ups and no more water slides.
Wook !!!!! Its'a Fwee Wiwwy !!!! The image of this man slideing down a waterslide in a speedo still makes me LOL.  RIP John.......This news saddened my day tremendously.
Absolutely terrible news! Probably my favourite comedian. Ill definitely miss him
My all time favorite.  All the above are classic.  Very sad news indeed. RIP SIR.
Good comedian.  He will be missed.  Too bad to...he recently had the gastric bypass surgery and had lost quite a bit of the weight.  Mark
Saw him about a year ago at Rama. Funny man, made me laugh.
RIP his humor was clean, self depreciating and so funny... Especially his bit about being in France and going to Italy for pasta. "GIT IN the CAR!!!!"
Saw that this morning, sad news indeed. RIP John.
Sad news, I had tickets to see him at Rama later this month too.

Aww a great one gone. "You've been here four hours"...The buffet one. I loved it!!!  Here it is...a classic but the best!!! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vAkXPpBnSkM  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vAkXPpBnSkM
saw him last year in Ottawa......truly one of the funniest. RIP
Saddest when the ones that make us laugh go...
